title: Quick Start to Modeling in MODO: Volume 2 - DigitalTutors

Quick Start to Modeling in MODO: Volume 2 <a href="
http://www.digitaltutors.com/tutorial/1657-Quick-Start-to-Modeling-in-MODO-Volume-2" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">

Released Jun 11, 2014
MODO 801
59m 42s
Project Files Included

Welcome to Volume 2 of the Quick Start to Modeling in MODO, a series of specially constructed courses meant to be followed in sequence and interspersed with valuable exercises to reinforce learned concepts. 

In the second volume of the Quick Start to Modeling in MODO, we'll build on the concepts covered in Volume 1. Here we'll concentrate more on using modeling tools and techniques to shape a seamless mesh, a molded weapons case in this instance.

We'll learn to add edge loops strategically and extrude geometry out from a surface. We'll learn to work symmetrically and learn to find and troubleshoot issues with the model. We'll also continue to repurpose polygons from our model to create new fitted pieces.

These courses are designed to be taken in sequence so we really encourage you to start with Volume 1 before continuing with this section.

We also encourage you to take advantage of the assignments that follow each volume. These assignments will allow you to take what you've learned and apply those tools and techniques to your own projects.
